testsuite.name: users.UsersPasswordFieldTest
testsuite.system-out: Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_usersPasswordPlaceholderText Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Password field Placeholder text in the Users Add screen" Password* text is displayed in the Password placeholder TC_usersPasswordPlaceholderText Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_usersPasswordMinimumLength Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Users Add screen Password field for the minimum character length" Performed click action on Users screen Password field Entered text "YOx" in the Users screen Password field Password must be greater than 5 characters error message is displayed TC_usersPasswordMinimumLength Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_usersPasswordSpecialChar Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Users Add screen Password field for the Special characters" Performed click action on Users screen Password field field Entered text "%,<'<*" in the Users screen Password field field Special characters are allowed in the password text field TC_usersPasswordSpecialChar Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_usersPasswordSpace Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Users Add screen Password field by entering Spaces" Entered space in the Users screen Password text field Space is not allowed error message is displayed TC_usersPasswordSpace Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_usersPasswordEyeIconEnable Testcase execution Started "This method verifies entered Password is displayed in encrypted format by default in Users Add screen" Performed click action on Users screen Password field field Entered text "thJ92qR" in the Users screen Password field field Performed click action on Eye icon field The password is displayed by default in encrypted format TC_usersPasswordEyeIconEnable Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_usersPasswordMaximumLength Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Users Add screen Password field for the maximum character length" Performed click action on Users screen Password field Entered text "sLMsAHCzmCznlabX" in the Users screen Password field Password must be less than 16 characters error message is displayed TC_usersPasswordMaximumLength Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_usersPasswordEmpty Testcase execution Started "This method verifies error message for the empty Password in the Users Add screen" Performed click action on Users screen Password field Entered text "" in the Users screen Password field Required error message is displayed TC_usersPasswordEmpty Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_usersPasswordAlphanumeric Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Users Add screen Password field for the Alphabetic characters" Performed click action on Users screen Password field Entered text "MLuSpS" in the Users screen Password field Alphanumeric characters are allowed in the password text field TC_usersPasswordAlphanumeric Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_usersPasswordEyeIconDisable Testcase execution Started "This method verifies entered Password is displayed in Plain text format on disabling View icon in Users Add screen" Performed click action on Users screen Password field field Entered text "lCXlrYR" in the Users screen Password field field Performed click action on Eye icon field Password is displayed in plain text TC_usersPasswordEyeIconDisable Testcase execution Completed
